title: Kinepolis to enter U.S. market with acquisition of MJR
text:
Kinepolis to enter U.S. market with acquisition of MJR

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 02, 2019 01:30)

© Reuters. Kinepolis to enter U.S. market with acquisition of MJR Sept 2 (Reuters) - Belgian cinema chain Kinepolis agreed to buy Michigan-based movie theater chain MJR Digital Cinemas for an enterprise value of $152.25 million to enter the U.S. market, it said on Monday. "The acquisition of MJR fits perfectly into our expansion strategy," Chief Executive Eddy Duquenne said.

Kinepolis to enter U.S. market with acquisition of MJR
